title: spec: error in http://golang.org/ref/spec#Constant_expressions section
body:
by **Matthew.Horsnell**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Go to http://golang.org/ref/spec#Constant_expressions
2. Read the lines:

Four * 300   // 300 cannot be represented as an int8
Four * 100   // 400 cannot be represented as an int8

Four at this point in the document should have the value 4, so the first comment should
read as follows:

Four * 300   // 1200 cannot be represented as an int8

The second comment is correct.

Please provide any additional information below.

This is a documentation error in the spec. It is very minor and trivial to fix.
